quotes.quote: Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.?
quotes.author: Hopper

quotes.quote: If anyone asks where I am, I've left the country.
quotes.author: Mike

quotes.quote: You shouldn't like things because people tell you you're supposed to.
quotes.author: Jonathan

quotes.quote: Nobody normal ever accomplished anything meaningful in this world
quotes.author: Jonathan

quotes.quote: I am on a curiosity voyage, and I need my paddles to travel. These books…these books are my paddles
quotes.author: Dustin

quotes.quote: Science is neat, but I'm afraid it's not very forgiving.
quotes.author: Mr Clarke

quotes.quote: You keep trying things on until something feels like you.
quotes.author: Max

quotes.quote: Use the shampoo and conditioner and when your hair’s damp, not wet, okay? When it’s damp, you do four puffs of the Farrah Fawcett spray.
quotes.author: Steve

quotes.quote: You can't spell America wihtout Erica
quotes.author: Erica

quotes.quote: My fingers are like arrows! My arms, like iron! My feet, like spears! Resist, and I will end you
quotes.author: Murry

quotes.quote: I need this phone and two weeks' advance. And a pack of Camels
quotes.author: Joyce

quotes.quote: When you’re different, sometimes you feel like a mistake. But you make her feel like she’s not a mistake at all. Like she’s better for being different.
quotes.author: Will
